data.name: Microsoft 365 Saturday San Antonio 2020
data.description: Get your own corner of the Web for less! Register a new .COM for just $9.99 for the first year and get everything you need to make your mark online — website builder, hosting, email, and more.

relatedRecords.name: IEEE Infrastructure Conference
relatedRecords.description: IEEE Infrastructure Conference - April 29-30, 2020 - San Francsico, CA USA - Highly relevant and future-looking technical keynotes and panels will anchor the event. The keynotes will stimulate the thinking and create the foundation for the day.

relatedRecords.name: Global Azure 2020 - Washington DC
relatedRecords.description:
The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthusiasts.
The Washington DC edition will take place on April 25th in the Arlington Tech eXchange (ATX)
